snippet: Catherine Greig’s pleas clear the way for prosecutors in Boston to focus on the multiple murder case against her boyfriend, James (Whitey) Bulger.
abstract: Catherine Greig, girlfriend of legendary crime boss James (Whitey) Bulger, changes her plea to guilty as part of plea deal, admitting that she helped Bulger evade capture for 16 years; US Attorney Carmen M Oritz insists that plea agreement is not 'a sweetheart deal' and that the government can still compel Greig to testify in Bulger's federal racketeering and murder case.
lead_paragraph: Catherine Greig’s pleas clear the way for prosecutors in Boston to focus on the multiple murder case against her boyfriend, James (Whitey) Bulger.

headline.seo: Bulger’s Girlfriend Changes Plea to Guilty
headline.main: Girlfriend of Crime Boss Changes Her Plea to Guilty
headline.print_headline: Girlfriend of Crime Boss Changes Her Plea to Guilty
